item_desc_11_0:
* "Hazelcakes" - All YP
* Hazelnut-walnut pancakes^1,
 only one./%
item_desc_13_0:
* "Toy Knife" - Weapon AT 3
* Made of plastic.
* Safe for me to use!/%
item_desc_19_0:
* "Bisicle" - Heals 11 YP
* It's a two-pronged popsicle^1,
  so I can eat it twice./%
item_desc_36_0:
* "Instant Noodles" Heals YP
* Comes with everything I
  need for a quick meal!/%%
item_desc_44_1:
* (After I get hurt by an
  attack^1, I stay invulnerable
  for longer.)/%%
item_desc_60_0:
* "Mystery Key" Unique
* It is too bent to fit on
  my keychain./%%
item_desc_63_0:
* "Snailcakes" - Heals Some YP
* An acquired taste./%%
SCR_TEXT_99:
* I bid a quiet farewell
  to the \[I].
SCR_TEXT_100:
* I put the \[I]
  on the ground and gave it a
  little pat.
SCR_TEXT_102:
* I threw the \[I]
  on the ground like the piece
  of trash it is.
SCR_TEXT_127:
* (The shadow of the ruins
  looms above^1, filling me with
  shining light.)/
SCR_TEXT_129:
* (Playfully crinkling through
  the leaves fill me with
  shining light.)/
SCR_TEXT_133:
* (Seeing such a cute^1, tidy
  house in the RUINS gives
  me shining light.)/%%
SCR_TEXT_134:
* The light no longer shines
  here./%%
SCR_TEXT_135:
* (The cold atmosphere of a
  new land... it fills me
  with shining light.)/%%
SCR_TEXT_136:
* (The convenience of that
  snowcat still fills me
  with shining light.)/%%
SCR_TEXT_143:
* (This simple fact fills
  me with shining light.)/%%
SCR_TEXT_144:
* (The sight of such a friendly
  town fills me with
  shining light.)/%%
SCR_TEXT_145:
* (The sound of rushing water
  fills me with
  shining light.)/%%
SCR_TEXT_146:
* (A feeling of dread hangs
  over me...^1)
* (But the light shines anyway.)/%%
SCR_TEXT_153:
* (The feeling of my socks
  squishing as I step
  gives me shining light.)/%%
SCR_TEXT_161:
* (Partaking in worthless
  garbage fills me
  with shining light.)/%%
SCR_TEXT_164:
* (I feel a calming
  tranquility^1. I'm filled
  with shining light...)/%%
SCR_TEXT_168:
* (The wind is howling^1.
* I'm filled with
  shining light...)/%%
SCR_TEXT_169:
* (The howling wind is
  now a breeze^1. This gives
  me shining light...)/%%
SCR_TEXT_170:
* (The wind has stopped^1.
* I'm filled with
  shining light...)/%%
SCR_TEXT_180:
* (The wooshing sound of steam
  and cogs..^1. it fills me
  with shining light.)/%%
SCR_TEXT_187:
* (Probably shouldn't tell her
  I like Mew Mew 2^1. That'd
  be disastrous...)/
SCR_TEXT_191:
* (A huge structure lies north.^1)
* (I'm filled with
  shining light.)/%%
SCR_TEXT_195:
* (The relaxing atmosphere
  of this hotel..^1. it fills
  me with shining light.)/%%
SCR_TEXT_199:
* (The air is filled with
  the smell of ozone..^1. it fills
  me with shining light.)/%%
SCR_TEXT_242:
* I leave the Quiche on the
  ground and tell it i'll
  be right back./%%
SCR_TEXT_314:
* Please adjust yourself
  to the sight of them./%
SCR_TEXT_884:
* (What do I tell Papyrus
  about his spaghetti?)
         Ate it      Left it   \C
SCR_TEXT_1025:
* (Should I take it?)
 
         Take it     Leave it  \C
SCR_TEXT_1535:
* (Golden flowers.^1)
* (They must have
  broken my fall...)/%%
SCR_TEXT_1626:
* I took another piece.
* I feel like the
  scum of the earth.../%%
SCR_TEXT_1631:
* In this terrible world^1, I
  can only take 3 pieces
  of candy.../%%
SCR_TEXT_1635:
* I tried to take a piece
  of candy^1, but I didn't
  have any room./%%
SCR_TEXT_1675:
* It's a Punchcard.
* Take it?
         Yes         No \C
SCR_TEXT_1694:
* I can't carry more.
* It's just too heavy./%%
SCR_TEXT_1723:
* Some spiders crawled down
  and gave me a donut./%%
SCR_TEXT_1726:
* I'm are carrying too
  many items./%%
SCR_TEXT_1754:
* Some spiders crawled down
  and gave me a jug./%%
SCR_TEXT_1790:
* I'm making the switches
  uncomfortable with all
  this attention./%%
SCR_TEXT_1842:
* I found a singular piece
  of Hazelnut-walnut pancakes./%%
SCR_TEXT_1853:
* I found a piece of
  snail pancakes.../%%
SCR_TEXT_1860:
* The pancakes have not
  cooled down yet./
SCR_TEXT_1946:
* (What should I say?)
         Let's be    What a
         friends     loser\C
SCR_TEXT_2740:
* (Do I beat it up?)

         Yes         No \C
SCR_TEXT_2752:
* (I tap the dummy with
  my fist.)/
SCR_TEXT_2758:
* (I don't feel like
  I've learned anything.)/%%
SCR_TEXT_2774:
* (I stare into their
  eyes for a moment...)/%%
SCR_TEXT_3080:
* He will finally take the
  surface back from
  humanity.../
SCR_TEXT_3086:
\E1* Or I'll tear it from
  your body./%%
SCR_TEXT_3155:
* (Sadistically^1, I've poured
  out all the water right in
  front of Undyne's eyes.)/
SCR_TEXT_3451:
* (I look inside a book.)
* (It's a comic book.)/
SCR_TEXT_3495:
See that lightbulb^1? 
That is your SOUL^1,
the very culmination
of your being!/
SCR_TEXT_3792:
* (Do I absolutely^1,
  dapsolutely want the answer?)
         Yes         No\C
SCR_TEXT_4050:
* (I punch the vegetables
  at full force^1.
* It knock over a tomato.)/
SCR_TEXT_4078:
\M0* (How will I put them in?)
 
         Fiercely    Careful\C
SCR_TEXT_4086:
* (I throw everything into
  the pot as hard as I can^1,
  including the box.)/
SCR_TEXT_4436:
* I am carrying too
  many items./%%
SCR_TEXT_4763:
* (It's just a regular suspicious
  bed now.)/
SCR_TEXT_4767:
* (It's a yellow key.^1)
* (I put it on my
  keychain.)/%%
SCR_TEXT_4847:
\E1* Niko...^1. I..^1.
* I understand if you
  can't forgive me./
SCR_TEXT_5073:
* (If I leave here^1, my
  adventure will really
  be over.)/
SCR_TEXT_5074:
* (My friends will follow
  me out of the underground.)/
SCR_TEXT_5136:
\E0YEAH^1!
NIKO WILL BE THE
BEST AMBASSADOR!/
SCR_TEXT_5143:
\E0IT'S OK NIKO^1!
I'VE GOT YOU
COVERED!/
SCR_TEXT_5156:
I want      I need
         to stay     to go
         with you    home\C
SCR_TEXT_5337:
* (Seems like I could skip
  Mettaton's monologue by
  turning him around now.)/
SCR_TEXT_5338:
* (What will I do?)
 
         Skip        Hear again\C
SCR_TEXT_5553:
* (Then I can fight the dog.^1)
* (... maybe.)/
SCR_TEXT_5663:
* (Seems like I could put
  something under the door.)/
SCR_TEXT_5727:
* (I put a Dog Salad in front
  of the door.^1)
* (It slides underneath.)/
SCR_TEXT_6968:
*\E0 I'm not sure why you
  would meow but...^2
  feel free to continue./
SCR_TEXT_6977:
\E1* ^1.^1.^1.And you say you
  are not a cat?^1
  \E9...Maybe a Froggit then?/
SCR_TEXT_6982:
\E3* ...Is your mother like
  this as well?/
SCR_TEXT_6983:
\E0* If so...^2 \E1 Well,^1 I won't
  meow back sadly.^1
  I'm a goat,^1 after all./
SCR_TEXT_6996:
* But the light no longer shines
  there./%%
SCR_TEXT_7009:
* The ringing is coming from
  inside my inventory./%%
SCR_TEXT_dogshrine_5944:
* (Seems I'll still have to
  donate just 1G at a time...)/
SCR_TEXT_dogshrine_5958:
* (Since my adventure is over^1,
  you can reminisce about how
  useful the Dog Shrine was...)/
SCR_TEXT_dogshrine_6004:
* (Perhaps if I leave and
  return^1, the donations will be
  used for something.)/%
SCR_TEXT_dogshrine_6046:
* (It's having a psychological
  effect on my desire to
  donate.)/

* I tell ASGORE that I
  don't want to fight him./

* I reduced how much DAMAGE
  I'll take this turn!/^

* I think about why i'm
  here now.../

* I can feel the empty
  space in my inventory
  get smaller and smaller!/^

* My items fill up with
  dreams./^
obj_asrielfinal_58:
* I feel something faintly
  resonating within ASRIEL.
obj_asrielfinal_59:
* I feel something
  resonating within ASRIEL.
obj_asrielfinal_60:
* I feel something strongly
  resonating within ASRIEL.
obj_asrielfinal_61:
* I feel our friends' SOULs
  resonating within ASRIEL!
obj_asrielfinal_468:
* Strangely^1, as your friends
  remembered me.../
obj_asrielfinal_552:
* Can't move my body^1.
* Nothing happened./
obj_asrielfinal_554:
* I tried to reach my
  SAVE file^1.
* Nothing happened./
obj_asrielfinal_555:
* I tried again to reach
  our SAVE file^1.
* Nothing happened./
obj_asrielfinal_556:
* Seems SAVING the world really
  is impossible./
obj_asrielfinal_560:
* But^1, having never SAVED
  before^1, I lack the power
  to do it./
obj_asrielfinal_565:
* Maybe^1, with what little
  power we have.../
obj_asrielfinal_976:
* I called out to our
  friends with all my
  heart./
obj_asrielfinal_977:
* From somewhere^1, I felt
  their support.../^
obj_asrielfinal_1007:
* I reached out to ASRIEL's
  SOUL and called out to our
  friends./

* (I rest my hand on
  the rusted bike.^1)/
obj_assortedtrash_91:
* (It's a DVD case for an

 is waiting for you.../

 it's been anymore.../

 Everyone suspects you've done
 something horrible.../
